data.title: The Big U. by Stephenson, Neal: Near Fine Paperback (1984) First Edition.
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Paperback - Random House, New York - 1984 - Condition: Near Fine - First edition of his first book, a trade paperback original. Never reprinted. Nice copy with tiny red remainder mark to bottom edge. Minor small crease to back top corner. Scarce book by the author of SnowCrash. - The Big U.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Shipping and insurance at cost. CT residents please add 6.0% sales tax. US buyers may pay via Checks, Money Orders and Credit Card payments through Paypal (username is derringerbooks@aol.com). Checks and money orders should be made payable to: "Alan Zipkin". International buyers should email ahead for accepted payment options. Please note that there no longer is a surface mail option for overseas shipping.

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
